actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the 2-year periods for rollover of gain on sale of principal residence to 3 years.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend from two to three years the rollover period for nonrecognition of gain on the sale of a principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the 2-year periods for rollover of gain on sale of principal residence to 3 years.
